Specimen Type(s): Digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MetaLite DX Digital Pathology Software for management and viewing of digital pathology slides from FFPE tissue using whole slide imaging.
Indications for Use Summary: Software intended for in vitro diagnostic use for viewing and management of digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides prepared from FFPE tissue to aid pathology primary diagnosis; not intended for use with frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
